subject: Football
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
lead_paragraph: Sam, a 25-year-old openly gay linebacker who never made it into a regular-season N.F.L. game last season, signed a two-year deal to play in the Canadian Football League.
snippet: Sam, a 25-year-old openly gay linebacker who never made it into a regular-season N.F.L. game last season, signed a two-year deal to play in the Canadian Football League.
